resources.string: Please turn on the GPS for the app to work
*يقدم التطبيق خدمات عرض الطلبات من العملاء على المندوبين وللمندوب الحق في اختيار الطلب المناسب من المعروض عليه، وله أيضا ان يضع السعر المناسب للتوصيل، وللعميل الحق في قبول العرض المناسب.
*متاح في التطبيق تقييم للعميل من قبل المندوب، وللمندوب من قبل العميل، وفي حال التقييمات السيئة فلتطبيق نايل اب الحق في اغلاق الحساب او إرجاعه وبالمدة المناسبة.
*في حال تقصير المندوب في التعامل والتجاوب الجيد مع العميل فللتطبيق الحق في ان يغلق الحساب حتى لو لدي المندوب رصيد.
*في البداية لا توجد أي تعويضات لاي طلبات سواء للعميل او المندوب، علي ان يتم وضع سياسة مناسبة لذلك فيما بعد.
*في حال رغبة النشاط التجاري لإضافة خاصية الدردشة بينه وبين العملاء او في حال رغبة النشاط التجاري للتسجيل علي العموم , فعليه التواصل مع التطبيق لمعرفة الشروط والتفعيل.
Make sure the phone number is correct
Not a Member yet? Sign Up here.
By clicking SignUp you agree all the Terms and Conditions.
Please enter your Registered Email Id below:
Enter your number other than 0 at the beginning
Please accept the terms and conditions
New update includes new features for you
*When you use the application, you agree to give us powers to use the information through which the appropriate service can be provided and to develop and update the application for ease of use.

*The idea of the application is based on making activities information available to users and therefore we provide public services and not personal or private data that would harm the user or the owner of the activity.

*What is requested when adding an activity is only 1-the activity\'s website for easy access and selection from among the existing activities 2- the name of the activity to facilitate research on it 3- the activity category in order to organize the activities and put the specific activity in the appropriate category 4- number to communicate in order to inquire or book an appointment Or ask about a product, etc.

*The data required to register the commercial activity leads to the ease of access to the activity and the widening of the customer base of the activity and thus the increase in sales or services, and this also helps us to increase the number of users for the application and thus serve a larger base of people.
*What is displayed to the user is the name of the activity, the category, the location of the activity and the contact number, if any, that is, what was listed by the owner of the activity and only.
*When you use the application, whether a user is searching for an activity or an activity owner and you want to add this activity, you agree to the terms of the application and privacy policy.

*Any violation of the application policy, inconvenience to the owner of the activity, or false information is recorded that would expose your account to being closed and not to use the application again.

*In the event that you object to the application as a user or business owner, please inform us through the application about the object of the objection or in the case of providing advice or assistance.

*In the event of non-response through the application and your objection to the application or its related matter still exists, you have the right and only to leave the application and not use it again and you have no right to any other method of objection.
